casebody.data:
Sibbald’s Estate. [February 19, 1851.]

In this case, the court ruled, that each party aggrieved by a decree of the court of common pleas, .or orphans’ court, must take a separate appeal to this court; and that upon every such appeal, the tax of three dollars and fifty cents, imposed by the act of the 6th April, 1830, is due to the commonwealth.
